problem.markdown:
1. Which conformation among syn and anti of dichloroethane is more stable? () Syn (x) Anti () Both are equally stable
2. What is the value of dihedral angle in anti conformation of dichloroethane? () 0 degree () 90 degree (x) 180 degree () 270 degree
problem.p: 1. Which conformation among syn and anti of dichloroethane is more stable?
2. What is the value of dihedral angle in anti conformation of dichloroethane?
